verbs.description: [ARG0: isis] [V: releases] [ARG1: another video of beheading] the militant group isis has released another gruesome video this time showing the execution of kidnapped japanese journalist kenji goto the japanese government says it appears to show his beheading at the hands of his captors holly williams reports cbs interactive isis
